GET_STARTED_MESSAGE.message: Get started by selecting an intervention below

ON_REROUTE_WITH_UNSAVED_CHANGES.message: Unsaved Changes: please Save or Discard changes made
ON_REROUTE_WITH_UNSAVED_CHANGES.description: prompt message warning against navigating away from unsaved changes

HOME_TITLE.description: page title base for SEO and tab text

IRS_TITLE.description: abbreviation for  Indoor Residual Spray, used for breadcrumbs, nav, and page titles

IRS_REPORTING_TITLE.description: page title for IRS reporting page

CONDITIONAL_FORMATTING_TITLE.description: legend header of column containing colors

FI_RESPONSE_ADHERENCE_TITLE.description: legend heder of column describing category definitions

DATE_CREATED.description: column header: date a plan was create

FOCUS_INVESTIGATION_START_TITLE.description: section label: the start date of a focus investigation plan

ADD_FOCUS_INVESTIGATION.description: button text: create a new focus investigation plan

UPDATE_PLAN.description: button text: edit an existing plan

ADD_PLAN.description: button text: create a new plan

CREATE_NEW_IRS_PLAN.description: button text: create a new IRS plan

CREATE_NEW_PLAN.description: button text: create a new plan; page title

NEW_PLAN.description: page title: page for creating new plans

NAME.description: label, column header: name, title, designation of an entity

START_DATE.description: label, column header: starting date of a plan or activity

END_DATE.description: label, column header: ending date of a plan or activity

SAVE_CHANGES.description: button text: save unsaved changes made

LEGEND_LABEL.description: section header: sidbar section containing a map legend

USERS.description: nav item: links to Admin > Users page

ABOUT.description: nav item: links to About page

LOGIN.description: header button: links to sign-in page

SIGN_OUT.description: header button: logs out the user

ASSIGN_PRACTITIONERS.description: bread crumb: label for the page for assigning practitioners to teams

ASSIGN_PLANS.description: page title, breadcrumb: label for the page for assigning practitioners to plans

MAP_LOAD_ERROR.description: error promt: warns user map won't load

AN_ERROR_OCCURED.description: error prompt: a general warning that something went wrong

PLEASE_FIX_THESE_ERRORS.description: error prompt: header on a page listing errors

NO_INVESTIGATIONS_FOUND.description: error prompt: message alerting that no plans were found

NO_PRACTITIONERS_ADDED_YET.description: warning prompt: message alerting that there are no practioners saved in the server

PLAN_SELECT_PLACEHOLDER.description: input placeholder: non-selected dropdown linking to other plans in the same focus area

PLAN_STATUS_UPDATE_ERROR.message: Sorry, something went wrong when we tried to update the plan status
PLAN_STATUS_UPDATE_ERROR.description: error prompt: general warning that something went wrong when saving a plan

NO_PLAN_FOUND_ERROR.message: Sorry, no plan found in the cloud!
NO_PLAN_FOUND_ERROR.description: error prompt: warning that the loaded plan doesn't exist on the server

SAVE_PLAN_DEFINITION_ERROR.message: Uh oh, looks like something is (syntactically) wrong with the Plan schema
SAVE_PLAN_DEFINITION_ERROR.description: error prompt: warning that the plan data schema being saved is incorrect

SAVE_PLAN_NO_JURISDICTIONS_ERROR.description: error prompt: warning that no jurisdictions were selected for the loaded plan

SELECT_USERNAME.description: input placeholder: non-selected dropdown to select OpenMRS user for the OpenSRP practitioner

SELECT.description: input placeholder, label: indicates the user making a selection from a dropdown or list

NO_PLANS_LOADED_MESSAGE.description: warning prompt: when there are no plans to render in the lists

SAVE_ASSIGNMENTS.description: button text: to save the configured team-plan-jurisdiction selection

SAVE_FINALIZED_PLAN.description: button text: to save a finalized plan definition to the server

SAVE_AS_DRAFT.description: button text: to save a draft plan definition to the server

SAVE_PLAN.description: button text: to save a plan definition to the server

SAVE_TEAM.description: button title: when saving a plan definition to the server
